item.title: Reducing Carbon Emissions Can Increase Revenue by 10 Percent
item.description: Investing in sustainability and decarbonization, when guided by strategy and executed effectively, becomes a business opportunity.

item.title: This Candidate Declined a Job Offer Over $5,000. The Reason Is Instructive for Any Employer
item.description: Going through the whole recruitment process and losing their top choice over a lowball offer cost this company more than a few thousand dollars.

item.title: I’m Afraid To Give Feedback After 2 Employees Threatened Self-Harm
item.description: I’m struggling to coach my team now.
